name: Bulk SMS Software
short_description:
Bulk SMS has a term that used to send number of messages in large mobile numbers via bulk sms gateway and software. In recent year the number of mobile users has increased in significant quantity and study shows that mobile user spend their maximum time on texting. Bulk messages is mainly used by organization and business unit to send notification or information to group, this is also one new era of marketing to promote product, services, offers and marketing of business. Some fact and benefits of SMS marketing 

Large User Data Base Approximately 1 Billion Mobile Subscriber Worldwide 
15% Messages are Commercial and Marketing Purpose
Quick Response Time 5 secs After Receiving 
Less Spam Only 1% 
98% SMS are Open 
150 per Day The Average Person Looks Their Mobile 
19% Average Click Through Rate

So, add sms marketing in your business and enjoy the benefit on it. Bulk SMS Noida is one of the best bulk text and voice messages service provider at very affordable prices.
